name: Portent of Betrayal
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

name: Renegade Tactics
oracle_text:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Nothing against you. It's just that waiting for Consulate clearance was never really my thing."

name: Rummaging Goblin
oracle_text: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor_text: To a goblin, value is based on the four S's: shiny, stabby, smelly, and super smelly.

name: Ripscale Predator
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: Dinosaurs rarely understand the idea of boundaries between the wild and the urban landscape.

name: Skyraker Giant
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: She will not be content until hers is the highest head in the sky.

name: Stonefury
oracle_text: Stonefury deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
flavor_text: Akoum can make any intruder look small.

name: Sparktongue Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Sparktongue Dragon enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fools believe that Kolaghan's brood follows lightning storms. The wise know that it is the other way around.

name: Volcanic Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: Sometimes an eruption in Shiv produces something more dangerous than a mere river of molten rock.

name: Undying Rage
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't block.
When Undying Rage is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Undying Rage to its owner's hand.

name: Volcanic Torrent
oracle_text:
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
Volcanic Torrent deals X damage to each creature and planeswalker your opponents control, where X is the number of spells you've cast this turn.

name: Ambush Viper
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"Living creatures seldom impress me. But I like this one."
—Uta Falkenrath

name: Crushing Vines
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text:
"Your veil's curse won't stop me, deathmage. I have taken down countless night hunters and this dark plane is not big enough for you to hide."
—Garruk Wildspeaker, to Liliana Vess

name: Fin-Clade Fugitives
oracle_text:
Fin-Clade Fugitives can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
Encore {4}{G} ({4}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.)

name: Lifecrafter's Gift
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: The best engineers recognize when a problem has already been solved.

name: Ivy Lane Denizen
oracle_text: Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "Skyknight gear? Well, I have drake-skin gauntlets, supple and fireproof. Or a ceratok chestplate that'll stop a crossbow bolt."

name: Lys Alana Bowmaster
oracle_text:
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may have Lys Alana Bowmaster deal 2 damage to target creature with flying.

name: Monstrous Onslaught
oracle_text: Monstrous Onslaught deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control as you cast this spell.
flavor_text:
"Regards from Peema."
—Rishkar

name: Molder Beast
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever an artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, Molder Beast gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"A trail of scrap metal can lead it into an ambush. But take care not to overfeed it."
—Adaran, Tangle hunter

name: Reshape the Earth
oracle_text: Search your library for up to ten land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"The land is not dead, merely dormant. It will awaken if you know how to ask."
—Gilanra, Caller of Wirewood

name: Ordeal of Nylea
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea.
When you sacrifice Ordeal of Nylea, search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Scrounging Bandar
oracle_text:
Scrounging Bandar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Scrounging Bandar onto another target creature.
flavor_text: "It was right here a second ago . . ."

name: Scaled Behemoth
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: Surviving an encounter with it is proof enough that an initiate is ready for the Trial of Strength.

name: Sentinel Spider
oracle_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text:
"Your first reaction may be to stand very still and hope she didn't see you. Trust me, she did."
—Endril, Kalonian naturalist

name: Stingerfling Spider
oracle_text:
Reach
When Stingerfling Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text: The juiciest prey is that which grows lazy, thinking itself beyond the reach of danger.

name: Silverback Shaman
oracle_text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
When Silverback Shaman dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: The apes of Yavimaya draw strength from the spirits of their ancestors.

name: Wildsize
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Two times the size, four times the smell.

name: Strength of the Pack
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.
flavor_text: The pack that ambushes, eviscerates, and devours together stays together.

name: Bell Borca, Spectral Sergeant
oracle_text:
Note the converted mana cost of each card as it's put into exile.
Bell Borca, Spectral Sergeant's power is equal to the greatest number noted for it this turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.

name: Captain Vargus Wrath
oracle_text: Whenever Captain Vargus Wrath attacks, Pirates you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game.
flavor_text: "To be a successful cutthroat, you have to truly enjoy the work."

name: Hamza, Guardian of Arashin
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: "I stand with every member of my clan, and they stand with me."

name: Jared Carthalion, True Heir
oracle_text:
When Jared Carthalion, True Heir enters the battlefield, target opponent becomes the monarch. You can't become the monarch this turn.
If damage would be dealt to Jared Carthalion while you're the monarch, prevents that damage and put that many +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: "I'm here for what's mine."

name: Kwain, Itinerant Meddler
oracle_text: {T}: Each player may draw a card, then each player who drew a card this way gains 1 life.
flavor_text: "Why so slow, why so slow? Hurry up! You never know what you'll find."

name: Karador, Ghost Chieftain
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
During each of your turns, you may cast a creature spell from your graveyard.
flavor_text: "Death tried to uncrown me. But now I return, king of a greater realm."

name: Marath, Will of the Wild
oracle_text:
Marath, Will of the Wild enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of mana spent to cast it.
{X}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Marath: Choose one —
• Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature. X can't be 0.
• Marath deals X damage to any target. X can't be 0.
• Create an X/X green Elemental creature token. X can't be 0.

name: Zedruu the Greathearted
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of permanents you own that your opponents control.
{U}{R}{W}: Target opponent gains control of target permanent you control.

name: Amorphous Axe
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and is every creature type.
Equip {3}
flavor_text: A weapon forged for every hand.

name: Angelic Armaments
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and is a white Angel in addition to its other colors and types.
Equip {4}
flavor_text: Forged in dark hours from the flame that would not die.

name: Burnished Hart
oracle_text: {3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Forged by divine hands to wander mortal realms.

name: Brass Herald
oracle_text:
As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

name: Dreamstone Hedron
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}{C}.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Dreamstone Hedron: Draw three cards.
flavor_text: Only the Eldrazi mind thinks in the warped paths required to open the hedrons and tap the power within.

name: Codex Shredder
oracle_text:
{T}: Target player mills a card.
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice Codex Shredder: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Foundry Inspector
oracle_text: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Automaton inspectors ensure that the Consulate's stringent standards for mass production are upheld.

name: Grafted Wargear
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +3/+2.
Whenever Grafted Wargear becomes unattached from a permanent, sacrifice that permanent.
Equip {0} ({0}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Hero's Blade
flavor_text: The best swords are forged with dragonfire.

name: Haunted Cloak
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has vigilance, trample, and haste.
Equip {1}
flavor_text: Bear the weight of so many spirits and you'll surrender civility and restraint to savagery and instinct.

name: Jalum Tome
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Most books simply deliver knowledge. This one expects some in return.

name: Howling Golem
oracle_text: Whenever Howling Golem attacks or blocks, each player draws a card.
flavor_text: It wails of buried riches and the souls lost seeking them.

name: Lumengrid Gargoyle
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"Anything that watches without sleep and fights without fear is a valuable ally against the Phyrexians."
—Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

name: Loreseeker's Stone
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Draw three cards. This ability costs {1} more to activate for each card in your hand.
flavor_text: Mages come from far and wide to bathe in its wisdom.

name: Pennon Blade
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control.
Equip {4}
flavor_text: Draped with the pennon of a fallen outpost, the sword came to symbolize the peoples of Zendikar becoming one.
